name: wp-rest-auth-oauth2
description: Secure OAuth2 authentication for headless WordPress, SPAs, and mobile apps

scripts.test:setup: wp-env run tests-cli bash -c 'wp plugin activate wp-rest-auth-oauth2 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test-unit && npm run test-integration
scripts.test-unit: npm run test:setup && wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-rest-auth-oauth2 vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite=unit --testdox
scripts.test-integration: npm run test:setup && wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-rest-auth-oauth2 vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite integration --testdox

author: WordPress Developer
